name: DN1210-027-001 - ITP Streetlighting - Ducting and Cable installation
template name: DN1210-027-001 - ITP Streetlighting - Ducting and Cable installation Rev 0

name: SECTION 1 – MATERIAL, PERSONNEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVAL
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Pothole all services prior to commencement of trenching. Suitably protect the existing services from construction damage.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm on site the exact location of cabling routes before trenching.
○ Where connecting and or coordinating with existing services, engineers shall make local modifications necessary for the correct operation of the entire system.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
1.1.3 - Location of Lighting Poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose Boxes
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm with surveyor and mark out the exact locations of lighting poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose boxes before installation.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
Verifying Document - Coase Sand - PSD Report

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Under roads and paved areas: Coarse sand, controlled low strength material or fine crushed rock. In topsoil areas: Complete the backfilling with topsoil for at least the top 50mm.
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Comments / Closeout Details - Backfill materials will either be site excavated GAP65 which had been approved at Earthwork stage) or Soil

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Use heavy duty HD PVC for underground services. Use best practice PVC where possible. Orange colour for all conduits containing consumer mains, sub-mains or final sub-circuits cabling
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Comments / Closeout Details - Same power ducts applied as Utility works
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Aco Cablemate Polycrete "type 66" Dimension: 665mm x 665mm x 620mm with heavy duty steel lid.
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Keep trenches free of water
○ No sharp projections, roots and other obstructions.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Minimum 50mm separation from other conduits; Also follow separation requirements by utility operators when in shared trench.
○ Where services cross, install electrical conduit at the topmost
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Seal buried entries of ducts and conduits using waterproof seals and/or conduit fittings.
○ Seal spare ducts and conduits immediately after installation and seal other ducts and conduits after cable installation.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - As built every ducts joint before backfill to accurately record the routes of underground cables.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install orange marker tape at 150mm or 50% of the depth of burial, whichever is greater, below finished ground level.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Backfill trenches as soon as possible after approval of laid and bedded service.
○ Place the backfill in layers < 150mm thick and compact to the density which applies to the location of the trenches to minimize settlement.
— Under maintenance pad, Clegg test will be used, with target CIV 25 for GAP65.
— Under berm area, no test needed on topsoil.
Verifying Document - Photo/Visual Inspection/Compaction result when under Road or paved areas
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install cable pits as detailed on the drawings.
Verifying Document - Comms with WSP/ Photo/Visual Inspection
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - As-built drawings with
6) the individual addresses of each luminaire, and their corresponding groups (if DALI) shown clearly for maintenance purposes.
7) All changes to design to be noted, highlighted or markup clearly.
Client Final Inspection - the signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Specifications and verifies lot compliance.
SECTION 1 – MATERIAL, PERSONNEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVAL
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Pothole all services prior to commencement of trenching. Suitably protect the existing services from construction damage.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm on site the exact location of cabling routes before trenching.
○ Where connecting and or coordinating with existing services, engineers shall make local modifications necessary for the correct operation of the entire system.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
1.1.3 - Location of Lighting Poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose Boxes
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm with surveyor and mark out the exact locations of lighting poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose boxes before installation.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Provide MSB-NMB shop drawings complete with wiring schematics for review and approval by the Engineer prior to construction.
Verifying Document - Shop Drawings and engineers approval

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Supply new Montrose Boxes on concrete plinth as per Electrical Services drawings. Box need to be fitted with a stainless steel hasp and staple brackets to allow for Waka Kotahi to fit their own padlock onto it.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3.b) & 23.1.5 a) ii; Drawing 0413, 0411, 0412.
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
1.2.3 - Luminaires & Poles -WK & TCC Redwood Ln RAB
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Luminaire and Pole types shall be supplied and installed as detailed on the drawings or as per instruction of Client
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Comments / Closeout Details - Purchase of Luminaires/Poles already approved by Client.
○ PE/SE need to check on site to guarantee right type of luminaries and poles are installed at specific location.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install new Montrose Boxes on concrete plinth as per Electrical Services drawings.
○ Install stainless steel hasp and staple brackets to allow for Waka Kotahi to fit their own padlock onto it.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3.b) & 23.1.5 a) ii; Drawing 0411 - 0413.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Install an earth electrode in accordance with the AS/NZS 3000. Install new Earth Bar and Neutral Bar c/w MEN link;
○ Install Circuit Protective Devices as specified in Drawings;
○ Install Switchboard as per details in Specification.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Liaise with the client’s electricity retailer for the installation of their three-phase meter within the metering compartment of the new Montrose Box.
○ Metering Agency supply of low Voltage meters and metering current transformers.
Verifying Document - Comms and Photo/Visual Inspection
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Types of luminaires and poles shall be installed as per details on the drawings or as per instruction of Client
○ Luminaires shall be fitted with Shorting Caps.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3 c-d); 23.1.5 f-g) & Drawing 0004, 0407-0409,0413
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Supply and Install final circuit cabling to Luminaires from the Montrose Boxes via underground ducts and conduits as per Drawing - proposed circuiting layout.
Standard / Specification - PS23.1.3 g); 23.1.5 e) & Drawing 0131 -0135
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - As-built drawings with
6) the individual addresses of each luminaire, and their corresponding groups (if DALI) shown clearly for maintenance purposes.
7) All changes to design to be noted, highlighted or markup clearly.

template name: DN1210-027-003 - ITP Streetlighting - Luminaire and CCTV @underpass Rev 0

name: SECTION 1 – MATERIAL, PERSONNEL & THIRD PARTY APPROVAL
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Pothole all services prior to commencement of trenching. Suitably protect the existing services from construction damage.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm on site the exact location of cabling routes before trenching.
○ Where connecting and or coordinating with existing services, engineers shall make local modifications necessary for the correct operation of the entire system.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
1.1.3 - Location of Lighting Poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose Boxes
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Confirm with surveyor and mark out the exact locations of lighting poles, Cameras, Cable Pits and Montrose boxes before installation.
Verifying Document - Survey data/Comms with Client
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Luminaire and Pole types shall be supplied as detailed on the drawings or as per instruction of Client.
○ Luminaires Controller - CASAMBI "CBU-TED" procured directly from Energy Light NZ.
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Comments / Closeout Details - PE/SE need to check on site to guarantee right type of luminaries and switch are installed at specific location.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - TCC Approved IP67 IK10+
○ With Weatherproof Housing , Vandal Resistant and PoE Dome (HD1080p, 2MP), Sensitivity down to 0.01 lux
○ Have intelligent auto exposure to offer front and back light compensation.
Verifying Document - Material data sheet and engineers approval
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Types of luminaire and poles shall be installed as per details on the drawings or as per instruction of Client.
○ Time and Dimming percentage be adviced by Light Engineer WSP.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3 c-d); 23.1.5 f-g) & Drawing 0415
Verifying Document - Comms and Photo/Visual Inspection

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Every second luminaire shall be on separate circuit (MSB-TC-NMB/R3 and B7) as per Drawing and terminate into a CASAMBI "CBU-TED" Dimmer Driver Controller via individual 230V-rated Switches.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Cameras mount at high level on chamfered edge of underpass or the underside of the sealing if no space after lighting installation.
○ Lockable CCTV Cabinet mount at high level underneath the chamfered edge of underpass.
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Cabling from cabinet to camera through ridged conduit.
○ Between Montrose Box(MSB-TC-NMB/R7) and Cabinet - Tight buffered outdoor OM4 Optical Fibre
○ Between Cabinet and Cameras --CAT6A U/UTP Cable in 25 mm conduit

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Liaison with TCC for IP addressing and Programming of PoE Network switches.

name: Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Carry out full commissioning of the Light Controls as detailed on the drawings.

Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - Carry out full commissioning of the Light Controls as detailed on the drawings.
○ Also record "Benchmark" energy meter reading from the lighting switchboards of all levels to demonstrate power consumption when ALL luminaires are running at 100%.
Verifying Document - Photo/Visual Inspection and Commissioning Records
Acceptance / Conformance Criteria - ON/OFF Operation + Dimming Function etc. on each Lighting Circuit under direction of Energy Light NZ utilising Calibrated Lux Meter.
Standard / Specification - PS 23.1.3 e); 23.1.5 g) & Drawing
Verifying Document - Photo/Visual Inspection and Commissioning Records

○ Testing CAT6A U/UTP Cabling from CCTV Cabinet to each CCTV Camera.
○ Liaison with TCC for Commissioning and Testing including camera adjustment to achieve the desired FOV.
